SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.services

Klasse CardServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.card2brain.services.CardServiceImpl
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
CardService, HasLogger
@Component public class CardServiceImpl extends Object implements CardService, HasLogger
This class provides the implementation for the CardService interface. It handles CRUD operations for cards and provides methods for learning cards. It uses the RepetitionService, UserService and CardRepository to perform its operations.
Seit:
16.01.2023

    • addCard

      public Card addCard(Card card)
      This method adds a card to the card repository.
      Angegeben von:
      addCard in Schnittstelle CardService
      Parameter:
      card - the card to be added
      Gibt zurück:
      the added card
      Löst aus:
      CardAlreadyExistsException - if the card already exists

    • updateCard

      public Card updateCard(Card card)
      Updates an existing Card in the database.
      Angegeben von:
      updateCard in Schnittstelle CardService
      Parameter:
      card - the Card object to update.
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated Card object.
      Löst aus:
      CardNotFoundException - if the Card with the given ID does not exist in the database.
      CardValidationException - if the Card object is not valid.

      Parameter:

    • isCardValid

      public boolean isCardValid(Card card)
      Method to check if a card is valid.
      Angegeben von:
      isCardValid in Schnittstelle CardService
      Parameter:
      card - The card to be checked for validity.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the card is valid, false otherwise.
      Löst aus:
      CardNotValidException - if the card is null, or if either the question or answer field is empty.
